DOC.brief_title: The Vitamin D Fetal Bone Length Study ( VITFBL )
DOC.detailed_description: Overall : The Odense Child Cohort Study ( OCC ) population-based cohort study , comprise pregnant woman recruit January 1st 2010 December 31st 2012 . All woman pregnant municipality Odense time eligible participation , 6,707 woman approach directly recruitment material . The study comply Helsinki declaration approve Regional Scientific Ethical Committee Southern Denmark , . S-20090130 . All participant give inform consent . From population base 6,707 pregnant woman , 2,874 ( 42.9 % ) enrol OCC December 31st , 2012 . The child follow 18 year age . Serum sample take early pregnancy ( GA 2-25 week ) , late pregnancy ( GA 26-30 week ) , maternal serum cord blood birth , child along general examination age 3 month , 1 year , 3 year . Questionnaires complete family early pregnancy , late pregnancy , birth , time clinical examination child . Register data health variable available Danish registry . Objective : The Vitamin D bone length Study examine relationship biomarker 25 ( OH ) D maternal serum length fetal femur humerus bone mid term pregnancy . Method : 25 ( OH ) D analysis : Serum store -80º Celsius analysis , perform liquid chromatography mass spectrometry ( LC-MS/MS ) . Triple deuterium mark 25 ( OH ) vitamin D3 add serum sample internal standard deproteinized ZnSO4 methanol , centrifuge 2750 g 10 minute , 100 μl inject TurboFlow column ( Thermo Scientific ) LC-MS/MS . The LC-MS/MS consist Thermo Scientific TLX1 system connect Thermo Scientific Vantage TSQ . 25 ( OH ) D2 25 ( OH ) D3 concentrate Thermo Scientific Cyclone P 50 x 1.0 mm column back-flushed analytical column , Phenomenex Gemini C18 50 x 3.0 mm elute analytical column gradient . Mobile phase A : 10 mM NH4Ac water B : 10 mM NH4Ac methanol . Human serum spike appropriate amount 25 ( OH ) D2 25 ( OH ) D3 order produce six point calibration curve ( weigh 1/x2 ) 3 level QC sample ( low , mid , high ) . The method calibrate NIST standard 972.25 The C3 epimer D3 detect along D3 two distinguishable one another . Lowest detectable concentration 0.15 nM D2 D3 . Values D2 D3 consider 6.5 nM .
